 KWayConstrMgr (unsigned int numParts)
bool satisfied (const Cell &cell, unsigned int, unsigned int toPart) const

Detailed Description

Multi-Way Constraints Manager. Mainly to answer question "Is a vertex allowed to move from one partition to another?"

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

bool KWayConstrMgr::satisfied ( const Cell &  cell,
unsigned  int,
unsigned int  toPart 
) const [inline]
Returns:
true if move is OK. In the current implement, only need to check the cell area constraint (cell weight). In the future, we may add other constraints such as #terminal on each partition.

References KWayConstrMgrBase::_diff, KWayConstrMgrBase::_lowerBound, KWayConstrMgrBase::_upperBound, and Cell::getWeight().
